subject_terms_3: Bose, Subhas Chandra Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
creator_2: Lt. K. E. Kochunni Nair, I. N. A. (?)
physical_appearance: This is an article from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly' published on 16 June 1946. The title is printed at the top-center of the page. There is an excerpt of the article printed in the center.  This article features four photographs of the Indian National Army. There are several small holes in the center of the page and along the spine.
title_text: The Orient The Story of the Indian Independence Movement
subject_terms_2: National liberation movements self-determination, national Nationalism Anti-imperialist movements Indian National Army Provisional Government of Free India Independence movements Bose, Subhas Chandra, 1897-1945 Singapore Periodicals
